issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Is not a bug in our product

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description:
On Studio 4.6 (on mac) I can't run my apps as every trial generates an invalid GUID error message, even for new apps.

My GUID is 6c8579ba-0e94-49fb-a115-0b83073186fd

comments.body: The error is thrown when you are trying to import a project that is not linked to the Appc-platform, yet (which is required in order to run apps from the Studio). If you click "yes", the error should not come again, same for new projects which are not created via Studio / appc-cli.
